## Description {#details}

Represents indexed loads.

These are different enough from regular loads that they get their own class. Including them in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ganyload">GAnyLoad</a> would probably make a footgun for someone.

Definition at line 102 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h">GenericMachineInstrs.h</a>.
